```{r}
source("main.R")
```

```{r}
X1_df = read.table("x1.tsv", sep="\t", header=TRUE, row.names=NULL)
X2_df = read.table("x2.tsv", sep="\t", header=TRUE, row.names=NULL)
X3_df = read.table("x3.tsv", sep="\t", header=TRUE, row.names=NULL)
Y_df = read.table("y.tsv", sep="\t", header=TRUE, row.names=NULL)
y = Y_df[, 1]
```

```{r}
moData = list(X1_df, X2_df, X3_df)
ncomponents=6
opt_num="full"
SMCCA_GS_out = MultiCCA_GS(moData, opt_num=opt_num, ncomponents=ncomponents)
```

```{r}
cv_x1 = SMCCA_GS_out$canon_var[[1]]
cor_cv_x1 = cor(cv_x1)
heatmap(cor_cv_x1, Colv = NA, Rowv = NA, scale="column")
```

```{r}
source("main.R")
ncomponents = 6
opt_num = "full"
outcome = "quantitative"
assay_name_list = c("x1", "x2", "x3")
SSMCCA_out = sup_MultiCCA_GS(assay_name_list, moData, y, outcome=outcome, opt_num=opt_num, ncomponents=ncomponents)
```
